channel.title: How to do key Auth response
channel.description:
How can I do Keyauth response to log in click on imgui
Eg shows message saying key expired or incorrect hwid
I’ve tested every method I can think of but can’t figure it out or find any info online

item.title: How to do key Auth response
item.dc:creator: OverDrive
item.description:
Im pretty sure the variable is called KeyAuthApp.response and it is a string variable

Edit :: it may also be called KeyAuthApp.response.message depending on the lang you are working with.

Read full topic
item.source: How to do key Auth response
